stories.content: A sentient octopus opens a coffee shop on Mars, but struggles with intergalactic taxes and espresso calibration.
Every Tuesday, gravity reverses in one small town. The mayor insists it's a marketing stunt—scientists disagree.
A disgraced time-traveling chef tries to win back their Michelin star in the year 3022 using dinosaur eggs.
Aliens mistake Earth’s internet memes for sacred texts and begin a religion based on Shrek.
A haunted vending machine starts granting wishes, but only in exchange for toenail clippings.
Two clouds fall in love during a thunderstorm and start a podcast on long-distance relationships.
A group of rebellious shadows separate from their owners and form a punk rock band.
The moon applies for citizenship on Earth and sues the sun for emotional distress.
A forgotten sock in the dryer becomes self-aware and starts writing poetry about loneliness.
A giant rubber duck floats into a city harbor, causing an economic boom and spiritual awakening.
